CustomField.formula: IF (FocusFiveProduct__c, CASE ( aforza__Account__r.FieldSalesRegion__c, "England North", IF($CustomMetadata.ProductSetting__mdt.OrgDefaultProductSettings.FocusFiveEngland__c + aforza__Purchase_Date__c <= TODAY(), "Not Lapsed", "Lapsed"), "England South", IF($CustomMetadata.ProductSetting__mdt.OrgDefaultProductSettings.FocusFiveEngland__c + aforza__Purchase_Date__c <= TODAY(), "Not Lapsed", "Lapsed"), "Scotland East", IF($CustomMetadata.ProductSetting__mdt.OrgDefaultProductSettings.FocusFiveScotland__c + aforza__Purchase_Date__c <= TODAY(), "Not Lapsed", "Lapsed"), "Scotland West", IF($CustomMetadata.ProductSetting__mdt.OrgDefaultProductSettings.FocusFiveScotland__c + aforza__Purchase_Date__c <= TODAY(), "Not Lapsed", "Lapsed"), "Unknown Sales Region" ), "Not Focus 5 Product")
CustomField.label: Focus 5 Status
